title: Welcome to the Mac Lab
text:
This is our first post on the Mac Lab blog!



Mac Lab logo


Thanks for taking the time to check out our blog. We are going to start publishing resources on here about 3D printing. If you have any questions, or guides you would like to see published, please email us at: mckaymaclab@byui.edu

title: About
text:
The Mac Lab is a creative space on the BYU-Idaho campus, within the David O. McKay Library. We are primarily an Adobe product help lab, but we have four 3D printers, and they available to anyone on campus.
We love to help teach, and educate on how best to use our Prusa 3D printers. For more information click here.

title: Mac Lab 3D Printing Blog
text:
The Mac Lab and 3D printing is a service offered by the David O. McKay Lirbary at Brigham Young University - Idaho. This is where we are going to post more about our 3D printers and how you, as a student or faculty, can use them. We’ll have “How-To’s”, “Feature Updates”, “Cool Prints”, and more!
Feedback request? Feel free to reach out to us: mckaymaclab@byui.edu














Welcome to the Mac Lab
